Title: MDownloader
Description: A tiny application designed for downloading files available at the most popular file hosting servers. Don't click - queue it.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A tiny application designed for downloading files available at the most popular file hosting servers. Don't click - queue it.

Features:
  • Page parsing to find supported links & matching interchangeable links (by name and size).
  • RSS monitoring, FilesTube & Release Database searching.
  • Download resuming (for those providers which support it in anonymous mode).
  • Password detection and captchas recognition (OCR engine will try to recognize it, but sometimes manual recognition is required).
  • Direct download & download via proxy mode (with authentication or without).
  • Download acceleration using interchangeable links or proxy servers.
  • Multiupload - upload a fileset to many providers at once.
Currently supported providers:
  • Bitroad.net
  • DepositFiles.com
  • EasyShare.com
  • FileFactory.com
  • FileServe.com
  • FileSonic.com (SharingMatrix.com)
  • Hotfile.com
  • Klurk.com (aggregate)
  • Letitbit.net
  • Load.to
  • MegaUpload.com
  • MirrorCreator.com (aggregate)
  • Rapidshare.com
  • SendSpace.com
  • uGotFile.com
  • Uploading.com
  • zShare.net
Requirements:
  • Microsoft .net Framework 3.5 SP1 install




The project now uses the EQATEC Analytics Service at http://analytics.eqatec.com for monitoring.
